curam.util.client.bopi

Interface LegacyBOPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    curam.util.client.bopi.BOPIConstants
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextHelper

    public interface LegacyBOPI
extends curam.util.client.bopi.BOPIConstants

    A interface to support access to BOPI functionality from legacy code. This interface uses the older method names for the methods invoked from legacy application code. It may be implemented by the TextHelper class to reduce the impact of changes due to the new BOPI interface. Where at all possible, the new BOPI interface should be used instead.

    This interface is not identical to the old interface; the exception types have changed and some of the methods are removed. However, as this interface is only used from JSP_SCRIPTLET code, the exceptions are not caught, so there should be no impact.

    Some of the method also return different values to those returned by the equivalent methods in the the new interface where this is required for backward compatibility. Values associated with code-table items are returned as item codes and not item descriptions.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface curam.util.client.bopi.BOPIConstants

      • getFieldIndex

        int getFieldIndex(java.lang.String fieldName)
           throws ClientException
        Gets the index of the field with the specified field name. This is a convenience method that may be required if the index is not readily available.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The full name of the field.
        Returns:
        The field index.
        Throws:
        ClientException - If field name is not recognized.

      • getFieldLabel

        java.lang.String getFieldLabel(int fieldIndex)
        Gets the value of the label used in the presentation layer for a field. This value is only available after the submission of form data and the population of the BOPI with the field values entered on the form. If a field does not appear on a form, it will have no label value.
        Parameters:
        fieldIndex - The field index.
        Returns:
        The field label value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is invalid.
